attributes.action: Make it a specific offence to park a vehicle on a footpath.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vehicles parked on footpaths mean that children, elderly, infirm, & mothers with prams have to go onto the road causing danger. Also damage is caused to the footpath, also causing danger to pedestrians & cost of repairs to local authorities. Apparently at present it is only an offence to drive on the footpath & lawyers perversely argue that if not witnessed there is no offence.
